TopicTitle: When will there be a new version?

Articles.Content:
Hi everyone,

I am just becoming so frustrated with KSP. My main problem is that I cannot save my games (flights). Quicksave F5 or forced saving with ALT+F5 does not work (it calles up the save/load menu but does not accept any input there). 

Just wondering: I heard there will be a new version (the one with female Kerbals, and lots of other new features), where I hope that these bugs become fixed.

Chris
I have heard ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) It's bin in the "news" for quite a while, so I wonder what "soon" means? 1 month? 1 year?

The week after you go crazy from waiting. ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

In all seriousness, no one knows. Squad probably doesn't even know themselves!

EDIT: Ninja'd!

Asking for the release date is in the rules by the way, so I'll be closing this thread, but it sounds like you're running KSP from the desktop so Windows data execution prevention won't let KSP make the save files.

Saving and loading does work, just not when you unzip KSP to a protected Windows folder.

Copy your KSP folder to C:\Games (you need to make this folder yourself), and run the copy, the original is no good, so you can delete it ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
